about_the_game:
Dreamworld Deluxe edition contains:


1.3 additional optional protagonists
- "Seductress", exclusive talent: Attacks units of the opposite sex with +10% base damage
- 'Sideburns', unique talent: Take base damage from male characters -30%
- "Wishful Man", exclusive talent: 50% base damage +30% when attacking a character whose energy is less than 20%

2. Additional exclusive weapon - available from Benjamin in Hangzhou
- Orange · Artifact -- Flying knife, Blue letters: Critical strike damage +20%
- Orange · Artifact -- Wine Gourd, Blue letter effect: Adds a layer of intoxication to the target. Damage to drunk targets +20%. (When drunk, the attacker's damage is increased *70%, triggering a backshift.)
- Orange · Artifact -- Three gold needles and blue letter: At the start of your turn, heal your unit with the lowest health, restoring it to damage + healer mastery *10 health, once per turn
- Orange · Artifact -- Turtle Shell, Blue word effect: When attacked, 20% of the damage is dealt by your own defense
- Orange · Artifact -- Moon Fan, Blue Letters: 20% of the time after dealing damage to the target, the target is blocked for one turn

3.Additional vow points appear on the map: Lover tree

4.And o month after the pledge o month draw will become the bride o month

5.More face pinching parts

6. Additional optional login subject screen
detailed_description:
Dreamworld Deluxe edition contains:


1.3 additional optional protagonists
- "Seductress", exclusive talent: Attacks units of the opposite sex with +10% base damage
- 'Sideburns', unique talent: Take base damage from male characters -30%
- "Wishful Man", exclusive talent: 50% base damage +30% when attacking a character whose energy is less than 20%

2. Additional exclusive weapon - available from Benjamin in Hangzhou
- Orange · Artifact -- Flying knife, Blue letters: Critical strike damage +20%
- Orange · Artifact -- Wine Gourd, Blue letter effect: Adds a layer of intoxication to the target. Damage to drunk targets +20%. (When drunk, the attacker's damage is increased *70%, triggering a backshift.)
- Orange · Artifact -- Three gold needles and blue letter: At the start of your turn, heal your unit with the lowest health, restoring it to damage + healer mastery *10 health, once per turn
- Orange · Artifact -- Turtle Shell, Blue word effect: When attacked, 20% of the damage is dealt by your own defense
- Orange · Artifact -- Moon Fan, Blue Letters: 20% of the time after dealing damage to the target, the target is blocked for one turn

3.Additional vow points appear on the map: Lover tree

4.And o month after the pledge o month draw will become the bride o month

5.More face pinching parts

6. Additional optional login subject screen
